body_html:
I think your diagnosis is correct, this never really worked, it just failed silently.

However, I think the 1.0 failure mode is a little more subtle: it is possible that TF worked fine assuming you never placed an op on the GPU.

That means that you could always use a GPU build of tensorflow, independent of whether a GPU (or libraries) were actually available. Now, with a GPU build, you actually need CUDA installed.

I don't think we want to support running GPU tensorflow on non-GPU machines (or rather, non-CUDA machines). I don't see a particularly compelling reason why you would want to do that.
